title: Pearce’s Groundwork Pays Off As Homebuyer Bill Passes House (Steve Pearce)
text: ( Source : Steve Pearce ) FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE: Washington, D.C. - U.S. Rep. Steve Pearce issued the following statement on the Homebuyer Assistance Act , H.R. 3192, which passed the House today by a vote of 303-121: 'As I have said before,
